statements: SELECT * FROM urban_noise_pollution_levels;
SELECT location_id, noise_level FROM urban_noise_pollution_levels WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM urban_noise_pollution_levels ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(noise_level) AS average_noise_level FROM urban_noise_pollution_levels GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT * FROM urban_noise_pollution_levels WHERE noise_level > 70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM urban_noise_pollution_levels WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, AVG(noise_level) AS avg_noise_level FROM urban_noise_pollution_levels GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT location_id, timestamp FROM urban_noise_pollution_levels WHERE noise_level > 70 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM urban_noise_pollution_levels WHERE noise_level BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY location_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, MAX(noise_level) AS max_noise_level, MIN(noise_level) AS min_noise_level FROM urban_noise_pollution_levels GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT city_name, noise_level, measurement_timestamp FROM noise_pollution_data;
SELECT strategy_name, city_name, strategy_description FROM mitigation_strategies;
SELECT noise_level, city_name, measurement_timestamp FROM noise_pollution_data;
SELECT strategy_description, city_name, strategy_name FROM mitigation_strategies;
SELECT * FROM noise_pollution_data;
SELECT city_name, noise_level FROM noise_pollution_data
SELECT * FROM noise_pollution_data WHERE city_name='New York'
SELECT city_name, noise_level FROM noise_pollution_data ORDER BY noise_level DESC
SELECT city_name, AVG(noise_level) as avg_noise_level FROM noise_pollution_data GROUP BY city_name
SELECT * FROM noise_pollution_data INNER JOIN mitigation_strategies ON noise_pollution_data.city_name = mitigation_strategies.city_name
SELECT * FROM UrbanAreas;
SELECT area_name, noise_level FROM UrbanAreas;
SELECT * FROM NoiseMeasurements WHERE noise_level > 50;
SELECT area_name, measurement_time FROM NoiseMeasurements ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT area_id, strategy_name, strategy_description FROM MitigationStrategies;
SELECT * FROM UrbanAreas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, noise_level FROM UrbanAreas WHERE noise_level > 50;
SELECT UrbanAreas.area_name, NoiseMeasurements.measurement_time FROM UrbanAreas JOIN NoiseMeasurements ON UrbanAreas.id = NoiseMeasurements.area_id;
SELECT area_name, strategy_name, strategy_description FROM UrbanAreas JOIN MitigationStrategies ON UrbanAreas.id = MitigationStrategies.area_id WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%Noise%';

SELECT UrbanAreas.area_name, AVG(noise_level) AS avg_noise_level FROM UrbanAreas JOIN NoiseMeasurements ON UrbanAreas.id = NoiseMeasurements.area_id GROUP BY UrbanAreas.area_name HAVING avg_noise_level > 60 ORDER BY avg_noise_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM noise_pollution_data;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM noise_pollution_sources WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT id, location, decibel_level FROM noise_pollution_data ORDER BY decibel_level DESC;
SELECT source_name, location, description FROM noise_pollution_sources WHERE source_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM noise_pollution_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, location, decibel_level, timestamp FROM noise_pollution_data;
SELECT * FROM noise_pollution_sources WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT source_name, description FROM noise_pollution_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM noise_pollution_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT source_name, location, mitigation_method FROM noise_pollution_sources JOIN noise_pollution_mitigation ON noise_pollution_sources.source_id = noise_pollution_mitigation.mitigation_id;
SELECT * FROM noise_levels;
SELECT area_name, noise_level FROM noise_levels WHERE noise_level > 80;
SELECT report_date, area_id, noise_level FROM noise_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM monitoring_devices WHERE device_type = 'microphone';
SELECT * FROM noise_levels WHERE noise_level > 70;
SELECT area_name, noise_level FROM noise_levels ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT source_name, provider_name FROM data_sources WHERE source_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT report_date, noise_level FROM noise_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
